label: 覆勘状
説明文: Certificate of completed service, issued to Kamakura vasssals by the bakufu's Kyoto Deputy (Rokuhara tandai) or the relevant provincial constable (shugo), acknowledging their service in the Kyoto Great Guard (Ōban) or as coastal defenders in northern Kyushu against the possibility of further foreign attack (ikoku keigo-ban).#[article]Satō Hidenari. Organizing Kamakura-era Military Documents.
